text: Alessandro Papatodoro (1560–1597) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Belcastro (1596–1597). (in Latin) (in Latin) ==Biography== Alessandro Papatodoro was born in Terra Francavilla in 1560 and ordained a priest in 1589. On 12 August 1596, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Paul III as Bishop of Belcastro. He served as Bishop of Belcastro until his death in 1597. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:16th- century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Paul III Category:1560 births Category:1597 deaths
title: Alessandro Papatodoro
